/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is teeming with life, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the street, their facades a testament to the architectural diversity of the city. Amidst the urban landscape, patches of greenery can be spotted, offering a refreshing contrast to the concrete structures. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
